name: PageUp Media.
description:
PageUp Media Technologies Pvt Ltd is a young and dynamic information technology services provider, creating effective and on-time solutions for a variety of enterprise needs. We specialize in utilizing Open Source technologies like php, codeigniter, wordpress, joomla, magento, drupal, oscommerce, zencart, plugin etc to develop solution for your businesses.
We produce COOL, CLEAN & GREAT designs. We are creative enough to create beautiful, unique and accessible web sites & follow high web standard like w3c valid code, html5, css3, jquery etc., We are excellent in SEO too.
